metadata.title: CVE-2024-56606 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:af_packet: avoid erroring out after sock_init_data() in packet_create()After sock_init_data() the allocated sk object is attached to the providedsock object. On error, packet_create() frees the sk object leaving thedangling pointer in the sock object on return. Some other code may tryto use this pointer and cause use-after-free.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
